Larsa Pippen Net Worth: Larsa Pippen is an Assyrian-American former model and TV personality who has a net worth of $10 million. Larsa Pippen earned fame through her modeling career, and as a member of the cast of The Real Housewives of Miami. She is also the ex-wife of NBA Super Star, Scottie Pippen.

Born on July 6, 1974, Larsa Pippen rose the fame as star of the TV reality show The Real Housewives of Miami.. The wife of a former NBA star, Scottie Pippen, she earned a spot on the Bravo's reality series Housewives that debuted on February 22, 2011. Larsa and Scottie Pippen tied the knot in 1997, and the couple has four children together. As of December 2019 they were in the process if finalizing their divorce.

A snarky beauty as she is, Larsa boasts that she is successful at everything she does, including playing the 24/7 role of a wife and mother of four. As she says, when she is not busy turning her three little boys in star athletes or shopping for her princess, Larsa is spending a little time on herself. Following her positive experience on the Housewives, it was announced that she and Scottie will star in their own reality series on WE tv, titled Big Pippen, slated for a 2013 debut. The woman once known as "Hottest NBA Wife" also made several appearances on Kourtney and Kim Take Miami, as Kim Kardashian's close friend.
